name: NSOpenSavePanelDelegate
desc: A set of methods for managing interactions with an open or save panel.

items.name: func panel(Any, userEnteredFilename: String, confirmed: Bool) -> String?
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user confirmed a filename choice by clicking Save in a Save panel.

items.name: func panelSelectionDidChange(Any?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user changed the selection in the specified Save panel.

items.name: func panel(Any, didChangeToDirectoryURL: URL?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user changed the selected directory to the directory located at the specified URL.

items.name: func panel(Any, willExpand: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the Save panel is about to expand or collapse because the user clicked the disclosure triangle that displays or hides the file browser.

items.name: func panel(Any, shouldEnable: URL) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether the specified URL should be enabled in the Open panel.

items.name: func panel(Any, validate: URL)
items.desc: Asks the delegate to validate the URL for a file that the user selected.
